about_the_game:
"Alchemy Diary of Kanon" is a multi-ending life simulation game where you guide a young girl aiming to become an alchemist.

The story follows Kanon, the protagonist, as she spends her days interacting with townsfolk and striving to achieve her dream of becoming an alchemist. Will she fulfill her goal? Who will she grow closer to along the way?
Your choices will shape the game's ending.

Story
Since childhood, Kanon has dreamed of becoming an alchemist.

She is convinced that becoming one will help her forge a deeper bond with her parents, even though she can no longer see them.

However, becoming an alchemist is not a profession that can be pursued at any time.

It requires a national qualification, and the opportunity to take the exam only comes once every few years.

The game begins on the day before the qualification exam. The exam period spans one year.
Will Kanon succeed in becoming an alchemist? And will she uncover the connection to her parents she longs for?

Overview

To become an alchemist, Kanon needs to improve her physical strength, intelligence, charisma, magical ability, and more.

Train Kanon within the given time frame to prepare her for the challenge ahead!

Additionally, you can perform alchemical synthesis as an alchemist.

Gather materials, craft items through synthesis, and use them strategically to develop your plans for growth.

Training every day can be exhausting, so taking breaks is also important.
You can skip training and spend time deepening your connections with the townsfolk instead.

Make the most of your training progress and aim to pass the alchemist qualification exam!
